00026 #ifndef HTTPSESSION_H
00027 #define HTTPSESSION_H
00028 
00029 #include <QDateTime>
00030 #include <QThread>
00031 #include "httprequest.h"
00032 #include "httpresponse.h"
00033 #include <exception>
00034 
00035 class QTcpSocket;
00036 
00037 class HttpSession : public QThread
00038 {
00039     Q_OBJECT
00040 public:
00041     explicit HttpSession(int socketDescriptor, QObject *parent = 0);
00042     virtual ~HttpSession();
00043     void run();
00044 
00045     // @ret should return the HTTP response status (404 not found, method not implemented,
00046     // ...) or 0. If a 0 is returned, the server continues to read the request, otherwise,
00047     // respond the request with the specified response code and closes the connection.
00048     // Default implementation returns 0 if version is lower or equals to the
00049     // last supported version or HTTP_VERSION_NOTSUPPORTED otherwise.
00050     // used to identify if this http request (version, method, uri, ...) is supported
00051     // always close the connection after respond the message
00052     virtual int isRequestSupported(const HttpRequest &request) const;
00053 
00054 protected:
00055     // used to respond BAD_REQUESTs
00056     // must be set in the constructor (HttpVersion isn't thread-safe yet)
00057     HttpVersion lastSupportedHttpVersion;
00058 
00059     virtual bool hasEntityBody(const HttpRequest &request) throw(HttpResponse) = 0;
00060     // @ret returns true when the entity body was fully received
00061     // in future, the entity body should be put on qiodevice buffer, not in memory
00062     virtual bool atEnd(const HttpRequest &request, const QByteArray &buffer) throw(HttpResponse) = 0;
00063     virtual void onRequest(const HttpRequest &request) = 0;
00064 
00065     void writeResponse(HttpResponse);
00066 
00067     // the ideia is to help to implement the Object pool pattern
00068     // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Object_pool_pattern
00069 //    virtual bool die();
00070 
00071 private slots:
00072     void onReadyRead();
00073 
00074 private:
00075 
00076     QTcpSocket *socket;
00077     int socketDescriptor;
00078     HttpRequest requestInfo;
00079     QDateTime birthTime;
00080     int state;
00081     QByteArray buffer;
00082 };
00083 
00084 #endif // HTTPSESSION_H
